features: Cool, kid-friendly DX3 features dual cameras for photos and videos; watch light is camera flash or flashlight
Create clockfaces from your photos or choose from 50+ animated faces; switch to School mode to use the DX3 as watch only
Pair with another DX3 and share preset messages or play games, or play solo; challenge yourself with three movement games
Download more games, clockfaces and camera effects from Learning Lodge; upcycle the watch box into a case

Intended for ages 4+ years; includes built-in, rechargeable lithium ion battery; charge device using included Micro-USB cable only and not a third-party adapter. This product is not compatible with iOS, Android, and GPS functionality.
body.description: The coolest and best-selling kids' smartwatch brand is here—the KidiZoom® Smartwatch DX3. The kid-friendly DX3 features dual cameras for pictures, selfies and videos along with one- and two-player games, daily reminders and more. The light on the watch doubles as camera flash and flashlight. Create custom clockfaces from your own photos or swipe through 50+ animated faces to make time-telling exciting. Set Daily Reminders to help you stay on track, and switch to School mode when it’s time to limit the DX3 to a watch only. Play single-player games like Monster Catcher and find 80+ invisible creatures! Challenge yourself with movement games: Racing Run, Crazy Dance and Funky Jump. Pair up with a friend who has a DX3 to share preset messages or play Treasure Hunt, Find the Diamonds and Tic-Tac-Toe. Upcycle the top of the package and use it as a watch storage case! Download more free games, clockfaces and camera effects from Learning Lodge®. Intended for ages 4+ years. Includes built-in, rechargeable lithium ion battery and Micro-USB cable. Do not charge using a third-party adapter. This product is not compatible with iOS, Android, and GPS functionality.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features: Capture & Get Creative Dual cameras capture everything from selfies to action-packed videos with just one touch. Add fun photo effects, stamps, frames and filters to explore creativity. Pair & Share Safely Scan the code on a friend's DX3 screen to securely share preset messages and play games together. (Requires two DX3 watches. Sold separately.) Cool Clock Faces Swipe through 50+ digital and analog animated faces or create a new one. Each face comes to life when tilted or tapped. Exciting Games Find AR monsters in the real world with Monster Catcher and play seven additional games.

Lights, Camera, Action! Use the built-in LED light and flash to brighten up dimly lit scenes or use as a flashlight. Daily Routines & Time Apps Set daily reminders like “Ok to Wake” and “Bedtime” to practice daily routines. Use the time apps to hear the time, practice telling time, use a timer, alarm and calendar too. Kid-Friendly Tech Includes parental game controls and time limits. Switch to School mode to limit the DX3 to a watch only. The sleek, easy-to-use design is just the right size for a child's wrist and includes a breathable strap. Secure Content Charge the battery, save photos, videos and more! No Bluetooth or wireless technology ensures watch content is secure.

VTech KidiZoom Smartwatch DX3 - Pink VTech KidiZoom Creator Cam VTech KidiZoom PrintCam VTech KidiZoom Camera Pix Plus VTech KidiStar DJ Mixer Item Model Number 80-549050 80-531800 80-549100 80-548900 80-547300 Age Range 4-12 Years 5-10 Years 4-11 Years 3-8 Years 5-10 Years Product Description This smart watch takes photos, videos, includes games, and lets you play games with other DX3 kids you know! Create HD videos with a green screen, tabletop tripod, 20+ backgrounds, invisibility tricks and more! Instantly print black and white digital photos without using any ink! Preview your shot using the color screen and add photo effects. This durable, kid-friendly 2.0 megapixel camera with 4X digital zoom lets kids get creative with 40+ camera effects, plus games! Create your own DJ sound mixes using the included songs or your own music. Remix 2000+ sound combinations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my 8 year old!
reviews.reviewText: My son asked for this from Santa after a friend of his had gotten one. He is 8 and this is just about perfect for him. It has enough features for him to be entertained with. He really likes that it has a camera and can make videos. It has some games which he likes to have while waiting around doing “boring” stuff like going to his sister’s basketball game.I like that it isn’t connected to the internet, but has smart features. It feels like a good introduction to moving towards his own smart device (as he gets older).The battery he charges every night but seems like it should last 2 or so days. The construction is well enough that it doesn’t seem like it would break from everyday use. We took it off to play sports. Buttons are responsive, as is the touchscreen.Overall a great first smartwatch for an 8 year old!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son is very happy with his smartwatch. It is very easy to use and have good apps and its battery last up to 4-5 days with a regular use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice color and easy to work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice gift for kids. I bought it for my son he loves it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great birthday gift.
reviews.reviewText: It wasn’t a surprise as the kiddo picked it out directly. But the kid absolutely adore it. It’s a great birthday gift.Aside from the watch itself, it comes with a box/case. The kid could store the watch inside it at night when they went to bed.It’s also pretty reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter who is 8 years old. She was so happy to get this, and she had it set up in no time. It seems to be a quality item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasted for 2 months. Update: Working now
reviews.reviewText: This is my second VTech watch, I got this for my son. It worked nicely for 2 months and then stopped working. I tried to turn it on/ off and use different cable to charge it, but it did not work. I reached out to the VTech company after 3 months (because I was busy and never thought warranty would be only 3 months) and they refused to replace it. The warranty is only 3 months because it is really cheap, and it might go dysfunctional really quickly. I am very upset with this experience, as I was a big fan of their products.Update 7/28/2022:I contacted the VTech support, they advised me how to fix the issue and now the watch is working. I will update this post if it stops working again. The VTech did show cooperation to replace it if the issue did not resolve...
Muy lindo. A mi hija le encantó, solo viene inglés y francés pero lo recomiendo mucho

I was told that the kids said that's the best Christmas present they received in 2021! That really made my day. The kids wear their VTech Smartwatch all day and to school. They use it as an alarm clock and now look forward to waking up for school every morning by the alarm. They have lots of fun with the watch.

My daughter loves it. It has lots of clock faces so she can pick the one she likes at any time. There is a lot of games and educational ones to help her learn her time's tables, spelling and maths. The camera is really good quality turning her into a paparazzi for the pets. It fits nicely on her wrist and the battery lasts for quite a while even though she plays with it all the time.

reviews.reviewerName: Es exactamente lo que buscaba, excelente.
reviews.reviewText: Todo lo necesario para hacer que sea apropiado para un niño
Watch is defective it cannot be charged. Cannot be powered on. Had to return it.
